Public Sub Complete ()

abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Complete%2A>已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A>任务将进入最终状态之后它已处理所有以前可用的数据。 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Complete%2A> 将不会阻止等待完成发生，而是将发起的请求; 但要等待的时间完成，发生，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A>可能使用任务。

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };
member this.Completion : System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.summary: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块视为已完成时它当前不在处理一条消息，当它具有保证不会处理更多消息。 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>关联的块完成时将转换为已完成状态。 它将转换为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>状态在阻塞完成其处理成功根据数据流块时定义的语义。 它将转换为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>状态在数据流块已完成处理过早地由于未经处理的异常，并且它将转换为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>时数据流块已完成的状态由于正在接收取消请求过早地处理。 如果任务在完成时处于<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>状态，其`Exception`属性将返回<xref:System.AggregateException>包含导致失败的块的一个或多个异常。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.System%23Threading%23Tasks%23Dataflow%23IDataflowBlock%23Fault%2A>已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.TransformManyBlock%602.Completion%2A>任务将进入最终状态。 出错块，作为与取消块，导致缓冲的消息 （未处理的输入的消息，以及 unoffered 的输出消息） 会丢失。

if the message was successfully consumed; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Called by a linked to accept and consume a previously offered by this .
Docs.returns: The value of the consumed message. This may correspond to a different instance than was previously reserved and passed as the to . The consuming must use the returned value instead of the value passed as through OfferMessage If the message requested is not available, the return value will be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>实例链接到此<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>实例可能使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>，和它必须仅用于使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>实例以前提供的此源到目标。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>实例链接到此<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>实例可能使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A>，并仅必须用于释放<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>之前并成功由目标保留的实例。

Docs.exception: The did not have the message reserved.

MemberSignature.Value: bool ISourceBlock<TOutput>.ReserveMessage (System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<TOutput> target);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock<TOutput>.ReserveMessage(valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1<!TOutput> target) cil managed
Function ReserveMessage (messageHeader As DataflowMessageHeader, target As ITargetBlock(Of TOutput)) As Boolean Implements ISourceBlock(Of TOutput).ReserveMessage

virtual bool System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock<TOutput>.ReserveMessage(System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TOutput> ^ target) = System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ISourceBlock<TOutput>::ReserveMessage;

Docs.param: The of the message being reserved.
The reserving the message.
Docs.summary: Called by a linked to reserve a previously offered by this .
Docs.returns: if the message was successfully reserved; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 仅<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>实例链接到此<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601>实例可能使用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A>，并且仅必须用于保留<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader>实例以前提供的此源到目标。
如果`true`返回，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock%601>必须随后调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ConsumeMessage%2A>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReleaseReservation%2A>此消息。 如果不这样做可能会导致无法进行任何进一步将消息传播到此或其他目标的源。
<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock%601.ReserveMessage%2A> 不得调用，而目标还保持任何内部锁。 这样将违反锁层次结构需要避免数据流网络中的死锁。

MemberSignature.Value: System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage (System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, TInput messageValue, System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock<TInput> source, bool consumeToAccept);

Function OfferMessage (messageHeader As DataflowMessageHeader, messageValue As TInput, source As ISourceBlock(Of TInput), consumeToAccept As Boolean) As DataflowMessageStatus Implements ITargetBlock(Of TInput).OfferMessage

virtual System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageStatus System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage(System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, TInput messageValue, System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ISourceBlock<TInput> ^ source, bool consumeToAccept) = System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TInput>::OfferMessage;

Docs.param: A instance that represents the header of the message being offered.
The value of the message being offered.
The offering the message. This may be .
if the target must call synchronously during the call to , prior to returning , in order to consume the message.
Docs.summary: Offers a message to the , giving the target the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
Docs.returns: The status of the offered message. If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, as it is now owned by the target. If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks. If the target would have otherwise postponed but source was , is instead returned. If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned. If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned. If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
Docs.exception: The is not valid. -or- may only be true if provided with a non-null .
